name: Survive The Day (Abraxasdusk)
description:
You're a vampire thrall separated from their master by the rising sun. You take cover in a nearby warehouse but you're not alone.. 

To keep up your strength you'll have to feed on the humans and rodents in the warehouse, while avoiding the sun pouring through the window.

Can you survive the day?!

Controls:

Movement:

WASD - Move

Left Shift - Run (with ability)

Combat:

Left Click - Lunge (hold to bite with ability)

Right Click - Slash
